job_details.Functieomschrijving: Nederlands (Nederland)  Do you like developing innovative solutions that automate repetitive tasks and make organizations more efficient? Make an impact as GenAI Engineer at Möbius!  Praktische informatie
job_details.full_text:
Engineer

  Nederlands (Nederland)  Do you like developing innovative solutions that automate repetitive tasks and make organizations more efficient? Make an impact as GenAI Engineer at Möbius!  Praktische informatie

profile_classification.rationale: The job title explicitly states 'GenAI Engineer' and the description focuses on developing innovative solutions that automate repetitive tasks, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer in building and deploying generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'developing innovative solutions' implies the creation and implementation of software, which is a core aspect of software development.
The phrase 'automate repetitive tasks and make organizations more efficient' directly relates to understanding business needs and applying technology to improve organizational processes.
job_tasks.phrase: automate repetitive tasks and make organizations more efficient
